info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Union County through 1145 PM EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Wadesboro to 4 miles south of Monroe to 9 miles south of Indian Land. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Wingate, Waxhaw, Marshville, Mineral Springs, Sturdivants, Jaars and Trinity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
